::Hevn::
       He shakes his head.  "Don't recognize me with my new coloration?  Oh 
well.  I remember you.  You're the bot that saved Kup from the paralytic gas.  
I doubt you have any real reason for being here except to rescue Nightlight.  
Now then, if, when you return to the Maximals as Maxima ordered you could tell 
Rodimus that Aerotaur will watch over his beloved until she decides to 
return, I would be much obliged."  He transforms to his robot form and looks her 
straight in the eye.  "However if she decides not to return I will protect that 
decision, even from him."

--part1_b2.1d684b3c.2c02d779_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
